data.eml:eml: Description of Ossinissa, a new pholcid genus from the Canary Islands (Araneae: Pholcidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Dimitrov, Dimitar, Ribera, Carles (2005): Description of Ossinissa, a new pholcid genus from the Canary Islands (Araneae: Pholcidae). Zootaxa 982: 1-13, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.273232
